subject: Golf
Families and Family Life
Parenting
Pregnancy and Obstetrics
lead_paragraph: Cristie Kerr, No. 1 in the world, faces the conundrum that caused Annika Sorenstam and Lorena Ochoa to retire: focus on golf or start a family?
